feed.title: Blogs | rdsx.dev
feed.subtitle: Hey! I am RDS (Rudro Dip Sarker), and its my personal blog where I share my learnings, experiences, and thoughts on different topics. I mostly talk about tech, but I don't have any specific niche. I write about whatever I find interesting. I hope you will find my blogs helpful. Happy reading!

entry.title: On scroll video playback effect
entry.summary: Let's create an on scroll video playback effect using ffmpeg, framer-motion & nextjs
